name: MDLMeshBufferMap
desc: An object that manages access to a memory buffer used for the data storage of a Model I/O mesh.

items.name: init(bytes: UnsafeMutableRawPointer, deallocator: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Initializes a buffer map object to manage access to the specified memory.

items.name: var bytes: UnsafeMutableRawPointer
items.desc: A pointer to the mutable memory managed by the buffer map.
